p: In this paper, ZIKAV-related publications and patents were reviewed to examine: i) LACâ€™s contribution to the worldwide scientific knowledge production and potential technological development; ii) research areas in which LAC countries mostly contributed; iii) role of LAC countries in the research network; iv) LAC patenting profile.
